name: microclimate-ls-node-prof
displayName: Microclimate Language Server for Node.js Profiling
description: Provides code highlighting showing relative time spent in JavaScript functions based on profiling data gathered through Microclimate Load Testing.
author: IBM

microclimateProfiling.showProfiling.description: Whether the method profiling information should be displayed in the editor pane.

microclimateProfiling.profilingfolder.description: The folder name containing load-test results files.

microclimateProfiling.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd vscode/client && npm run update-vscode && cd ../.. && npm run compile
scripts.compile: npm run compile:client && npm run compile:server
scripts.postinstall: cd vscode/client && npm install && cd ../../server && npm install && cd ..
